trans-unit.source: Describes the direction to move a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control to increase the amount of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> that is visible.

This enumeration is a return value type for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback> delegate that is used to define custom placement for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control changes position by moving along the horizontal axis of the screen before moving along the vertical axis.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control changes position according to default <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> behavior.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control changes position by moving along the vertical axis of the screen before moving along the horizontal axis.
